message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $110. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $95. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but $95 is a little too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $105.  That's a good price for both of us, let's make this happen.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product. This is the highest I can go while staying within my budget.
